headline: PPG to support EuroSkills Herning 2025 vocational skills competition
summary: COPENHAGEN, Denmark, April 07, 2025--PPG will support EuroSkills Herning 2025, Europe’s largest vocational skills event, as Main Skill Sponsor for the Painting and Decorating competition.
